title: Hiota no Kanojo ga Ore no Motteru Eroge ni Kyoumi Shinshin Nanda ga…… - Novel Updates

description: Kazuma, a highschool student who loves eroge • was been confessed by the honour student and beautiful girl, Misaki Honoka, who is the school’s prodigy. What’s more, Honoka had declared that she would try her best to become a “heroine” that Kazuma likes?! “Can you …… train me?” What kind of eroge is this?>
